basics.name: Ayushi gupta
basics.label: Senior software engineer at Deloitte
basics.summary: Experienced Full Stack Software Engineer with 6+ years of expertise in developing scalable web applications using .NET Core, .NET Framework, C#, ASP.NET, Angular, Entity Framework, and SQL Server. Proficient in leveraging Azure Cloud services, RESTful APIs, and full-stack development to deliver secure, high-performance solutions. Proven track record of driving user engagement, optimizing application performance, and delivering end-to-end software solutions aligned with business goals in Agile environments.

work.name: Deloitte
work.description: Deloitte, one of the Big Four accounting firms, is the largest global professional services network by revenue and workforce.
work.summary: Leading the development of AQMM, a mission-critical application built using .NET Core, C#, and Azure, designed to monitor audit quality in Deloitte's audit processes. Successfully deployed across 130+ countries, ensuring scalability, reliability, and compliance with global standards.
highlights: Developed a robust framework leveraging C#,.NET Core, .NET Framework, Entity Framework, SQL Server, Angular, and Azure Cloud, driving the global success of AQMM by ensuring scalability, performance, and seamless integration.
Recognized for mentoring and guiding junior developers, fostering a collaborative, growth-oriented team environment, and promoting best practices in .NET Core, Angular, and full-stack development.

education.institution: Shri G S Institute of Technology & Science

awards.title: Outstanding, Applause and Spot awards
awards.summary: Won 6 outstanding, applause and spot awards.

awards.title: Azure fundamentals and Azure data fundamentals
awards.summary: Certified with Microsoft AZ-900 and DP-900

projects.name: Multi Geo
projects.description: Redesigned and optimized the existing database architecture using SQL Server and Entity Framework to align with country-specific databases, ensuring compliance with regional regulatory requirements and improving data integrity and performance.
highlights: Restructured the existing database into a four-level hierarchical architecture using SQL Server and Entity Framework, enhancing scalability and data organization.
Deployed database servers to new geographical locations, ensuring low-latency access and improved performance.
Facilitated seamless data migration to the new database architecture by leveraging Azure Data Factory (ADF) pipelines, ensuring accuracy and minimal downtime.

projects.name: AQMM web application
projects.description: Developed and consolidated reporting dashboards using .NET Core, Angular, and Power BI to streamline engagement data filed by auditors, enabling real-time insights and improved decision-making.
highlights: Working as a Full Stack Developer, delivering end-to-end features across both backend and frontend using .NET Core, C#, Entity Framework, Angular, and SQL Server, ensuring seamless integration and high-performance solutions
Redesigned the API layer and implemented microservices architecture using C#, .NET Core, and .NET Framework, enhancing scalability, maintainability, and system performance.
Integrated Redis for efficient cache management, optimizing application performance and reducing database load in .NET Core and C#-based applications.
